name: Pack 'n Stack
description:

Game -

We had a problem with the mesh colliders on the shelves which makes the boxes fall through. This is a minor problem to fix although we ran out of time.

The point of the game is to grab the boxes and put them in the truck or the outside skip depending on the box.
